text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeTypeDescription
should-shallbooleanCodes with this property true must have shall or should appended in the grammar
expressionstringExpression that expresses aggregate codes using the grammar

Concepts

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/json-empty-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
absent When there's no items, the json property for the array must be missing
present When there's no items, the json property for the array must be present and empty
either When there's no items, the json property for the array may be present and empty, or absent

name: JsonEmptyBehaviorCodes
title: Json Empty Behavior Codes
description: empty-behaviour: what should be in JSON when a repeating elements has no items. Can be absent, present, or either

property.description: Codes with this property true must have shall or should appended in the grammar
Expression that expresses aggregate codes using the grammar

concept.definition: When there's no items, the json property for the array must be missing
When there's no items, the json property for the array must be present and empty
When there's no items, the json property for the array may be present and empty, or absent
